author: Tom Perrotta
title: How the Toronto Maple Leafs Built a Cup Contender
text:
The Toronto Maple Leafs are a team with loving fans and an arena that fills up no matter their record. Much like the Chicago Cubs in baseball, losing didn’t affect the bottom line, so for decades the struggling team didn’t do much to change. But finally, after years of failure, the Leafs have done something unheard of in the team’s history: They dropped everything and started anew.
With the recent success of MLB teams like the Cubs and Houston Astros building a winner from the ground up, the Leafs are aiming to make that breakthrough... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
